text:
SimpleForms / Software Engineer / San Diego, Remote / Fulltime www.simpleforms.com

SimpleForms takes the pain out of employee onboarding paperwork. We serve SMBS, Contractors and Enterprises. Small but growing team backed by Techstars, and an amazing set of investors. Looking for someone that wants to own product, and build a robust yet simple platform. We play with React, Meteor, Node etc.

Happy to provide more detail just reach out to emily at simpleforms

Please, NO recruiters.
